text: 301 is a number. It comes after 300 and before 302. == In mathematics == * 301 is an odd number. * It is a composite number, because it has more than two factors. * The prime factorization of 301 is: 301 = 7 Ã— 43 * The digits of 301 add up to 4 (3 + 0 + 1 = 4). * 301 is the sum of three consecutive prime numbers: 97 + 101 + 103 = 301 == In other areas == * HTTP 301 is a code used on the internet. It means a web page has been moved permanently to a new address. * Year 301 AD was a year in ancient times. According to tradition, San Marino was founded in that year, making it one of the oldest republics in the world.
title: 301 (number)
